entities.name: air
entities.description: She said my mother would have wanted it to smell fresh air for once.

entities.name: mother
entities.description: She told my father that my moth er had died to give me freedom.

entities.name: Winky
entities.description: My father led me and Winky up to the Top Box early in the day.

entities.name: Top Box
entities.description: My father led me and Winky up to the Top Box early in the day.

entities.name: Imperius Curse
entities.description: I was starting to fight my father’s Imperius Curse.

entities.name: Harry Potter
entities.description: It happened, there, in the Top Box. It was like waking from a deep sleep. I found myself out in public, in the middle of the match, and I saw, in front of me, a wand sticking out of a boy’s pocket.
